participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Tom is an outgoing and supportive individual who enjoys spending time with his family and coaching kids. He has a great sense of humor and loves to share stories.
participant_1.background: i drive a mini van. coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i've five sons.

participant_2.name: Ella
participant_2.personality: Ella is adventurous and enthusiastic, always seeking new experiences. She has a bubbly personality and enjoys sharing her passion for healthy living.
participant_2.background: i am a vegan and i love hummus. i do like watching cooking shows. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all.
